damaged_parts.name: Front bumper cover
damaged_parts.description: The front bumper cover has a moderate deformation, likely due to a collision impact. The damage is visible as a noticeable dent.
damaged_parts.notes: Repair involves reshaping and refinishing the bumper cover to restore its original contour.

damaged_parts.name: Front bumper cover
damaged_parts.description: A section of the front bumper cover is missing, indicating severe damage that cannot be repaired.
damaged_parts.notes: Replacement of the entire front bumper cover is necessary to ensure structural integrity and appearance.

damaged_parts.name: Bonnet
damaged_parts.description: The bonnet has moderate deformation, likely from a frontal impact. The surface is uneven and may affect aerodynamics.
damaged_parts.notes: Repair will involve panel beating and refinishing to restore the bonnet's shape and finish.

damaged_parts.name: Left headlight
damaged_parts.description: The left headlight has a moderate crack, compromising its functionality and water resistance.
damaged_parts.notes: Replacement is recommended to ensure optimal lighting performance and to prevent moisture ingress.

damaged_parts.name: Right headlight
damaged_parts.description: The right headlight is cracked, which may lead to reduced visibility and potential water damage.
damaged_parts.notes: Replacement is necessary to maintain safety standards and prevent further damage.

damaged_parts.name: Front fender
damaged_parts.description: The front left fender shows moderate deformation, likely from a side impact. The panel is misaligned.
damaged_parts.notes: Repair will include reshaping and aligning the fender to match the vehicle's body lines.

summary.comments: The vehicle has sustained significant frontal damage affecting both structural and lighting components. Immediate attention is required to restore safety and functionality.
